DOC.detailed_description: Preterm birth ( baby bear 34 week pregnancy ) occur approximately 11 % pregnancies; preterm birth lead complication baby . When mother identify risk go preterm birth ( give birth within next 14 day ) several treatment available may help reduce likelihood complication baby . These treatment usually need start within 24 hour important diagnose preterm labour fast accurate . There several method commonly use within hospital diagnose mother may risk go preterm labour . The two common one foetal fibronectin ( fFN ) phosphorylated insulin-like growth factor bind protein 1 ( phIGFBP-1 ) . The purpose study compare two test see accurate predict preterm birth . This prospective comparative study fFN ( control ) PhIGFBP-1 test ( comparator ) woman singleton pregnancy 22-34 week gestation present self-reported sign , symptom complaint suggestive preterm labour . Both test do every participant - test sequence every 5 participant fFN test undertaken first next cohort 5 PhIGFBP-1 swab take first . This remove potential bias surround test undertaken first . Data collection ( case report form ( CRFs ) ) clearly document test perform 1st 2nd .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion age ≥ 18 year confirm pregnancy gestational age 22 34 week selfreported sign , symptom complaint suggestive preterm labour ; abdominal pain contraction pelvic pressure Exclusion criterion unable provide write informed consent multiple pregnancy participate interventional clinical trial symptom associate idiopathic threaten preterm delivery ( e.g . trauma ) contraindicate either fFN PhIGFBP1 ; e.g . vaginal bleed cervical dilation ≥3cm dilate evidence rupture membrane intercourse last 24 hour cervical cerclage situ placenta praevia
